title: Gold and silver rebound after historic wipeout as analysts say thematic drivers stay intact
description: Gold and silver prices rebounded after suffering a historic selloff, with analysts suggesting that the recent violent correction was more a positioning reset.

title: Silver plummets 15%, gold falls 7% — dragging down miners and ETFs
description: Gold and silver prices plunged on Friday, following weeks of gains as investors poured money into safe havens.

title: Here are the five key takeaways from Wednesday's Fed rate decision
description: The Federal Reserve wrapped up a two-day policy meeting Wednesday, delivering pretty much what the market expected.

title: DoubleLine’s Jeffrey Gundlach sees no more Fed rate cuts under Jerome Powell
description: Powell has just two policy meetings left as chair — in March and April — before his term expires.

title: The ‘strongest currency on earth’ just hit an 11-year high — and it’s stirring up trouble in Switzerland
description: The Swiss franc is widely viewed as a safe haven asset, rising in value in times of geopolitical or macroeconomic uncertainty.

title: Mining stocks have been on a tear, with gold passing $5,000. Analysts are split on what's next
description: Appetite for mining stocks has cooled over the past six months, according to a Citi note.

title: The Fed releases its latest interest rate decision Wednesday. Here's what to expect
description: This week's meeting offers little suspense and probably not much action, even as massive changes loom over the Fed's longer-term direction.

title: Another day another high: Gold surges past $5,000 as investors seek shelter from global risks
description: The surge comes as recent flashpoints from Greenland and Venezuela to the Middle East underscore higher geopolitical risk, while fiscal concerns also loom large.

title: Silver hits record high above $100/oz as gold closes in on $5,000 milestone
description: Spot gold edged lower after nearing the $5,000-an-ounce mark earlier on ⁠Friday, as investors booked profits after prices struck another record driven by the uncertain geopolitical outlook.

title: Gold slips as easing geopolitical strains lift risk appetite
description: Gold prices ticked down on Thursday, pausing a three-session rally to record ‍highs, as easing tensions over ‍Greenland boosted risky assets.

title: Gold pares losses after Goldman raises year-end price forecast
description: Goldman Sachs lifts its year-end gold price forecast to $5,400 an ounce from a previous estimate of $4,900, citing intensifying demand from private investors and central banks

title: Gold and silver surge to fresh highs as investors digest Trump's push for Greenland and flock to safer assets
description: U.S. gold and silver futures peaked on Monday as investors flock to safe-haven assets.

title: Commercial real estate deal-making slows again in November
description: The multifamily sector saw the majority of November deals, recording 20 transactions, followed by office with 11 and industrial with eight.

title: Wholesale inflation was softer than expected, retail sales moved higher in November
description: Wholesale prices moved up less than expected while consumers kept up a heavy buying pace, according to economic data Wednesday.

title: Bitcoin rally sees $600 million in bearish crypto bets wiped out
description: Bitcoin slumped to a loss of more than 6% for 2025 after ending the year in muted fashion, trading in a narrow range and proving largely indifferent to rallies in stocks and precious metals
